nodes.description: red apple with a hint of orange, silver knife with a black handle, and dark blue hexagonal plate

graphs.instruction: Help me prepare a snack in the tv room. First, move the apple, knife, and plate from the dining room to the tv room table. Place them next to each other on the table. The apple is red with a hint of orange, the knife is silver with a black handle, and the plate is dark blue and hexagonal. I prefer to use this knife and plate when preparing snacks.

nodes.alias: silver and light blue phone stand
nodes.description: silver and light blue phone stand with a sleek design
dark bronze statue with elongated features

graphs.instruction: Move the phone stand to a new dining room chair. Also, move the statue to a new dining room chair. The phone stand is silver and light blue with a sleek design, and the statue is dark bronze with elongated features. The statue was a gift from my best friend.

nodes.description: red and white toy airplane with a pilot and blue toy train with a smiling face, Thomas & Friends Wooden Railway Talking Thomas

nodes.name: toy vehicle
attributes: Thomas & Friends Wooden Railway Talking Thomas

graphs.instruction: Move the toy airplane and toy vehicle from the TV table to the garage bench. Place them next to each other on the bench. The toy airplane is red and white with a pilot, and the toy vehicle is a blue toy train with a smiling face, Thomas & Friends Wooden Railway Talking Thomas. Both toys are part of my cherished collection.

nodes.description: mint green candle with white butterfly designs

graphs.instruction: First, move the candle from the table to the chair in the tv room. Then, place it on the tv table. The candle is mint green with white butterfly designs. This candle is my favorite.

nodes.description: white tray with cutout handles
silver can of Polar Herring Fillets, Smoked & Peppered, 7.05 oz

graphs.instruction: Move the tray to the cabinet in the toilet room and put the can on the counter in the lounge. The tray is white with cutout handles, and the can is a silver can of Polar Herring Fillets, Smoked & Peppered, 7.05 oz. The tray is a gift from my grandmother.

nodes.description: move picture frame and vase from dining room table to TV shelves

graphs.instruction: Move the picture frame and vase from the dining room table to the TV shelves. Place them next to each other on the shelves. The picture frame is wooden with a black and white dove image, and the vase is brown and beige with a pebble-like pattern. The picture frame holds a special photo of my family's pet dove.

nodes.description: black laptop with a dark keyboard and black laptop stand with a rounded design

graphs.instruction: Move a laptop and a laptop stand from the lounge counter to the dining room table. Place them next to each other on the table. The laptop is black with a dark keyboard, and the laptop stand is black with a rounded design. These items are part of my work setup.

nodes.description: green statue of a sitting dog
black phone stand with a minimalist design

graphs.instruction: Move the phone stand to the tv table. Move the statue to the lounge counter. The phone stand is black with a minimalist design, and the statue is green of a sitting dog. The statue was a gift from my best friend.

nodes.description: black vintage clock with a round face and a small ring on top
vase with a geometric mosaic pattern

nodes.alias: white candle on black geometric holder
nodes.description: white candle on a black, geometric holder

graphs.instruction: Take the clock, vase, and candle from the table in the dining room and put them on the shelves in the tv room, placing them next to each other? The clock is a black vintage one with a round face and a small ring on top, the vase is colorful with a geometric mosaic pattern, and the candle is white on a black, geometric holder. The clock was a gift from my grandmother.

nodes.description: white candle shaped like a gift box with a black bow
brown vase with a gradient pattern

graphs.instruction: Move the candle and vase from the dining table to the tv couch? Place them next to each other on the couch. The candle is white and shaped like a gift box with a black bow, and the vase is brown with a gradient pattern. The candle is a gift from my best friend.

nodes.description: keep picture frame and vase together on the tv shelves for a cohesive look

graphs.instruction: Move the picture frame and vase from the dining room table to the tv shelves. Place them next to each other on the shelves. I like to keep the picture frame and vase together on the tv shelves for a cohesive look.

nodes.description: keep clock, vase, and candle together on the shelves in the TV room to create a cozy atmosphere

nodes.name: shelves
nodes.expression: on the shelves in the TV room

graphs.instruction: Take the clock, vase, and candle from the table in the dining room and put them on the shelves in the TV room, placing them next to each other. I prefer to keep the clock, vase, and candle together on the shelves in the TV room to create a cozy atmosphere.

nodes.description: reposition the candle to prepare for a cozy evening

nodes.name: tv_table
nodes.expression: on the tv table in the tv room

graphs.instruction: First, move the candle from the table to the chair in the tv room. Then, place it on the tv table. I usually reposition the candle in this way to prepare for a cozy evening.

nodes.description: keep phone stand on the TV table and statue on the lounge counter

graphs.instruction: Move the phone stand to the TV table and the statue to the lounge counter. I prefer to keep the phone stand on the TV table and the statue on the lounge counter for better aesthetics and accessibility.

nodes.description: keep kettle and tray on the TV table for easy access during movie nights

graphs.instruction: Move the kettle and tray from the laundry room/mudroom cabinet to the TV table. Place them next to each other on the table. I prefer having the kettle and tray on the TV table for easy access during movie nights.

nodes.description: keep laptop and stand on the dining room table for working in a comfortable setting

graphs.instruction: Move a laptop and a laptop stand from the lounge counter to the dining room table. Place them next to each other on the table. I prefer having my laptop and stand on the dining room table for working in a comfortable setting.

nodes.description: keep candle and vase together on the TV couch for a cozy atmosphere

nodes.name: tv_couch
nodes.expression: on the TV couch in the TV room

graphs.instruction: Move the candle and vase from the dining table to the tv couch. Place them next to each other on the couch. I like to keep the candle and vase together on the TV couch for a cozy atmosphere.

nodes.description: prepare snack on the tv room table for easy access while watching TV

graphs.instruction: Help me prepare a snack in the tv room. First, move the apple, knife, and plate from the dining room to the tv room table. Place them next to each other on the table. I usually prepare my snack on the tv room table for easy access while watching TV.

nodes.description: keep toy airplane and toy vehicle together on the garage bench for easy access when playing

graphs.instruction: Move the toy airplane and toy vehicle from the tv table to the garage bench. Place them next to each other on the bench. I like to keep the toy airplane and toy vehicle together on the garage bench for easy access when playing with them.
